verses.roman:
prātaḥ-kāle snāna kari' karilā gamana
bhakta-gaṇe vidāya dilā kari' āliṅgana

synonyms: prātaḥ-kāle—in the morning; snāna—bath; kari'-after taking; karilā—started; gamana—tour; bhakta-gaṇe—to all the devotees; vidāya—farewell; dilā—gave; kari'-doing; āliṅgana—embracing.
translation: The next morning, after taking His bath, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu started on His South Indian tour. He bade farewell to the devotees by embracing them.
